description.title: Product Description
description.description:
• For all things Apple — iPad, AirPods, Apple Watch, iPhone, MacBook, iCloud, accessories, and more.
  • Perfect for App Store purchases and subscriptions — get apps, games, music, movies, TV shows, and more.
  • The perfect gift to say happy birthday, thank you, congratulations, and more.
  • Card delivered via email.
  • Use it for purchases at any Apple Store location, on the Apple Store app, apple.com, the App Store, iTunes, Apple Music, Apple TV+, Apple News+, Apple Books, Apple Arcade, iCloud+, Apple Fitness+, Apple One and other Apple properties in the US only.
  • To make purchases at an Apple Store location, take the gift card to the Apple Store before redeeming it.
  • For online purchases on your Apple Account, go to apple.com/redeem to add to your balance.
  • Not valid for other payments.
  • No returns or refunds on Apple Gift Cards. Terms apply.

Use it for purchases at any Apple Store location, on the Apple Store app,apple.com, the App Store, iTunes, Apple Music, Apple TV, Apple News, Apple Books, Apple Arcade, iCloud, and other Apple properties in Netherlands.

· Use the Apple Gift Card for App Store, iTunes, iPhone, iPad, Air pods, Mac book, accessories, and more.

· The perfect gift to say happy birthday, thank you, or congratulations. 

· Card delivered via email. 

· No returns or refunds on Apple Gift Cards. Terms apply.

· Not valid for other payments.

description.title: Redemption
description.description:
The Apple Gift Card can be used two ways:

· For online purchases, go to apple.com/redeem to add to your Apple Account balance

· Bring this email to any Apple Store location.

description.title: Terms and Conditions
description.description:
Pas op voor fraude met cadeaukaarten. Deel je code nooit met anderen. 
Alleen geldig voor aankopen in Nederlandse Apple Stores (winkels, online en in Apple apps). Ga voor ondersteuning naar support.apple.com/giftcard. Niet inwisselbaar bij Apple resellers of tegen contant geld, wederverkoop niet toegestaan, en restitutie of retourneren is niet mogelijk, tenzij wettelijk verplicht. Apple is niet verantwoordelijk voor onrechtmatig gebruik. Er zijn voorwaarden van toepassing: kijk op apple.com/nl/go/legal/gc voor meer informatie. Uitgegeven door Apple Distribution International Ltd. (ADIL). Onbeperkt geldig. © 2022 Apple Distribution International Ltd. Alle rechten voorbehouden.

description.title: Product Description
description.description:
Power up in over 1M Android apps and games on Google Play, the world's 
largest mobile gaming platform. Use a Google Play gift code to go 
further in your favorite games like Clash Royale or Pokémon Go or redeem
 your code for the latest apps, movies, books, and more. There’s no 
credit card required, and balances never expire. Treat yourself or give 
the gift of Play today.

description.title: Redemption
description.description: Only use this gift card's code on Google Play. Any other request for the code may be a scam. Visitplay.google.com/giftcardscam or call1-855-466-4438.To redeem, enter code in the Play Store app or https://play.google.com/store .

description.title: Terms and Conditions
description.description:
See play.google.com/us-card-terms for full terms. Must be 13+ years of age, US resident. Google Play card is issued by Google Arizona LLC (“GAZ”). Requires Google Payments account and internet access to redeem. Redeemed balance is maintained by GAZ’s affiliate, Google Payment Corp. (“GPC”), in your Google Payments account. Usable for purchases of eligible items on Google Play only. Not usable for hardware and certain subscriptions. Other limits may apply. No fees or expiration dates. Except as required by law, card is not redeemable for cash or other cards; not reloadable or refundable; cannot be combined with other non-Google Play balances in your Google Payments account, resold, exchanged or transferred for value. User responsible for loss of card. For assistance or to view your Google Play card balance, visit support.google.com/googleplay/go/cardhelp. To speak to customer care call us at 1-855-466-4438.

 

Brand Partner Contact:

Call: 1-855-466-4438.

description.title: Marketing Description
description.description: Top up your own gold bar balance in Candy Crush Saga or Candy Crush Soda Saga, or gift to a friend, to spend in-game on extra moves, lives and boosters. Perfect for passing those tricky levels!

description.title: Redemption Instructions
description.description:
HOW IT WORKS 

Redeem your gold bars for use in Candy Crush Saga or Candy Crush Soda Saga!  
Spend gold bars in-game on extra lives, boosters and extra moves.

1. You will receive your gift card via email
2. Open the email to find your card's code and PIN
3. Go to store.king.com
4. Sign into your account or create a new account
5. Enter the code and PIN on the site
6. Choose the game you want to add the gold bars to
7. Head to the game and enjoy!

description.title: Terms and Conditions
description.description: US only. This gift card is sold in the name of and on behalf of King.com Limited. The value of this gift card can only be used once in either Candy Crush Saga or Candy Crush Soda Saga. Redemption requires that you have a supported authentication account (directly with King with your email or via Facebook login only) for such game which is subject to your acceptance of our King Games Terms and Conditions. You must be 13+ to play our games and require parental consent if you are under 18 to create an account. Upon redemption this gift card will credit your game account with an amount of gold bars which will be determined at the time of redemption, giving you the best possible value at that time and has no value outside our game and until its activated. No refund or exchange for cash. No partial redemption is permitted, and this gift card does not expire. Use of our games require internet connection and can be played on compatible devices only. King is not responsible if this gift card is used without your permission or if its lost, stolen, damaged or destroyed. For all applicable terms please check our site Terms, the King Games Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy at https://www.king.com/termsAndConditions and https://www.king.com/privacyPolicy or directly in our games.

description.title: Redemption Instruction
description.description:
TO REDEEM YOUR V-BUCKS, ENTER THE PIN BELOW AT FORTNITE.COM/VBUCKSCARD 

To use this card you must have a valid Epic Account, download Fortnite on a compatible device, and accept the terms and user agreement. Read the full terms at fortnite.com/vbuckscardterms before purchasing.
The card’s full-face value is deducted at redemption and associated with a single account for the device you select (no transfer or withdrawal). 
Review your device maker’s terms for any additional requirements to play Fortnite (e.g., subscriptions, additional fees). No fees or expiration dates. Card can’t be returned, reloaded, refunded, redeemed for cash, exchanged, or resold except as required by law. 
This card can’t be replaced if lost, stolen, destroyed, or used without permission.

description.title: Product Description
description.description:
• Get even more out of Roblox. 
• Deck out your avatar and unlock additional perks in your favorite experiences when you use Roblox Gift Cards to purchase Robux (Roblox's virtual currency). 
• Or get exclusive access to virtual items, a monthly Robux stipend, and more by redeeming your gift card for a Roblox Premium subscription. 
• Get a free virtual item when you redeem a Roblox Gift Card.
• Roblox is a global platform where every day millions of people come together to explore, chat, and hang out in millions of immersive 3D experiences created by the community.

description.title: Redemption
description.description:
1. Go to Roblox.com/redeem

2. Log in or create an account

3. Find your PIN and enter it on the website

4. Spend your credit on Robux and more!

description.title: Terms and Conditions
description.description:
This card may only be redeemed at www.roblox.com for Roblox credits, which may only be redeemed for Robux or a Roblox Premium Subscription. Availability and pricing of Robux and Premium Subscriptions are subject to change. To redeem this card and use Roblox credits, you must be over 18 years old or obtain consent from a parent or guardian, have Internet access, register for a Roblox account, and accept the Roblox Terms of Use. No partial redemption is permitted. This card is not refundable or redeemable for cash, except as required by law. Resale is strictly prohibited. Roblox is not responsible if this card is used without your permission or if it is lost, stolen, damaged, or destroyed. A card obtained by fraud will not be honored. Only one virtual item is made available per account per month or such other period as Roblox may designate. For minimum system requirements and more information, including how to determine the balance of your gift card, please visit www.roblox.com or contact us at www.roblox.com/support.

© 2023 Roblox Corporation. All rights reserved. All trademarks shown are property of Roblox Corporation.

description.title: Product Description
description.description:
Enjoy hundreds of high-quality games with Xbox Game Pass Ultimate. Play new games on day one like Starfield from Bethesda Softworks as well as iconic franchises like Halo from Xbox Game Studios, indie games, blockbusters, and more. Includes online multiplayer so you can play together with friends on console, PC, and cloud. Plus, an EA Play membership gives you access to
top titles on console and PC, including best-loved series like Battlefield™ and
STAR WARS™. Get more from the games you love, including exclusive in-game challenges and rewards, special member-only content, and early trials of select new EA titles. Tap into the heart of the Xbox community and join millions of players ready to play together with Xbox Cloud Gaming (Beta). Jump in on your Xbox Series X|S and Xbox One—no installs required. With Game Pass Ultimate, you also get free Perks including in-game content, consumables, and more. Get member discounts off select games in the Xbox Game Pass library and related game add-ons. Discover and keep playing a game with cloud gaming across console, Windows PC, or phones and tablets.

description.title: Redemption
description.description: Redeem at https://www.microsoft.com/redeem

description.title: Terms and Conditions
description.description:
Play on: Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Windows 10/11 with updates (excludes S Mode and ARM). See xbox.com/gamepass.
Requires: Download(s), apps, significant storage, broadband (fees may apply), and Microsoft account. Terms: See
xbox.com/subscriptionterms. Games, features and service vary over time, by region/platform, and may be retired. 
If a game is removed from catalog, you must buy the game to continue using purchased in-game content. 
Existing Gold and Game Pass members will be converted to Ultimate using a conversion ratio; conversions are final. Except as required by law, codes are nonrefundable. 
Subject to the Microsoft Services Agreement (microsoft.com/msa). ©/TM/® 2022 Microsoft.

description.title: Product Description
description.description:
Enjoy hundreds of high-quality games with Xbox Game Pass Ultimate. Play new games on day one like Starfield from Bethesda Softworks as well as iconic franchises like Halo from Xbox Game Studios, indie games, blockbusters, and more. Includes online multiplayer so you can play together with friends on console, PC, and cloud. Plus, an EA Play membership gives you access to
top titles on console and PC, including best-loved series like Battlefield™ and
STAR WARS™. Get more from the games you love, including exclusive in-game challenges and rewards, special member-only content, and early trials of select new EA titles. Tap into the heart of the Xbox community and join millions of players ready to play together with Xbox Cloud Gaming (Beta). Jump in on your Xbox Series X|S and Xbox One—no installs required. With Game Pass Ultimate, you also get free Perks including in-game content, consumables, and more. Get member discounts off select games in the Xbox Game Pass library and related game add-ons. Discover and keep playing a game with cloud gaming across console, Windows PC, or phones and tablets.

description.title: Product Description
description.description:
Get unlimited access to over 100 Xbox One and Xbox 360 games on Xbox One
 for one low monthly price. Play highly-anticipated new games the day 
they’re released, and enjoy a wide variety of games, from recent 
blockbusters, to critically-acclaimed indie titles. Discover and 
download titles you’ve always wanted to play or revisit favorites that 
you’ve been missing. Games are selected for high ratings and fun, and if
 you love an Xbox One game currently in the existing catalog and want to
 own it, you can buy it and save up to 20%,plus get 10% off any Xbox One
 game add-on. With new games added every month, and the option to cancel
 anytime, Xbox Game Pass is your ticket to endless play. Sign in for 
your available offers. Promotional offers may not be valid for all 
members.

description.title: Terms and Conditions
description.description:
NO CREDIT CARD REQUIRED. VALID FOR USE IN THE U.S. Use your active Xbox Game Pass Ultimate plan membership to play games on Xbox One and Windows 10 PC. Includes Xbox Game Pass Console Games plan, Xbox Game Pass PC Games plan, and Xbox Live Gold. Maximum 36 months of Ultimate redeemed per account at a time. Game titles and number vary overtime and by country. If your membership terminates or a game is removed, you must reactivate your membership or buy the game to continue using any add-ons or items purchased for a game. ISP fees and age restrictions apply. Terms and exclusions apply to discount offers. Service, features, and requirements may change or be retired. Subject to Microsoft Services Agreement (microsoft.com/msa). If you’re already an Xbox Game Pass or Xbox Live Gold member, any days remaining in your membership(s) will be converted to Ultimate using a conversion ratio. Future code redemptions also subject to conversion ratio. All conversions to Ultimate are final. Learn how this works atxbox.com/game pass. Except as required by law, codes are nonrefundable. For PC: App download, Windows update(s) and storage required. System requirements vary by game; performance scales with higher end systems.

 

Brand Partner Contact:

Visit: https://www.microsoft.com

description.title: Product Description
description.description:
Get unlimited access to over 100 Xbox One and Xbox 360 games on Xbox One
 for one low monthly price. Play highly-anticipated new games the day 
they’re released, and enjoy a wide variety of games, from recent 
blockbusters, to critically-acclaimed indie titles. Discover and 
download titles you’ve always wanted to play or revisit favorites that 
you’ve been missing. Games are selected for high ratings and fun, and if
 you love an Xbox One game currently in the existing catalog and want to
 own it, you can buy it and save up to 20%,plus get 10% off any Xbox One
 game add-on. With new games added every month, and the option to cancel
 anytime, Xbox Game Pass is your ticket to endless play. Sign in for 
your available offers. Promotional offers may not be valid for all 
members.

description.description: Have a Microsoft account or Xbox Live profile? Simply log in to your account onxbox.com/redeem code and enter the 25-digitcode.Need an account? Go toxbox.com/live, follow the steps to create a new account, then enter the25-digit code. For more information on how to redeem codes on your Xbox console, visit https://www.xbox.com/howtoredeem-console

description.title: Terms and Conditions
description.description:
NO CREDIT CARD REQUIRED. VALID FOR USE IN THE U.S. Xbox Game Pass is a game subscription for Xbox One; active subscription required to play games. Titles and number of games vary over time and by country, and are not available in all countries. DLC sold separately; if a game is later removed from Game Pass or your subscription terminates, you will need to purchase the game separately to continue using the DLC. Xbox Live Goldmembership (sold separately)required for some games and for online multiplayer on Xbox One. ISP download charges may apply. Some titles only downloadable by account holders 18+. Game Pass discounts not combinable with other offers and not redeemable for cash; discount offers exclude titles within 30 days of launch; discounts based on Microsoft Store price.Requirements, features, online services, or subscription subject to change and/or retirement. Subject to the Microsoft Services Agreement(microsoft.com/msa).Images on front of card are representative of catalog games. Game selection varies over time. Learn moreatxbox.com/game-pass. ©/™/® 2018 Microsoft

description.title: Product Description
description.description:
MINECRAFT MINECOINS PACK-3500 COINS Use Minecoins to purchase skins, 
textures packs, maps and more exciting content made by Minecraft 
community creators! Find new ways to play by visiting the in-game 
Minecraft Marketplace, where you’ll discover a constantly updating 
library of exciting new Minecraft content-from a community whose 
imagination knows no limits! Once you’ve redeemed your Minecoins, 
they’ll be linked with your Xbox Live account, so you can access your 
coins and purchases through all of your supported devices that run 
Minecraft.

description.title: Description
description.description:
Only Player ID & Nickname is needed for Garena Free Fire Diamonds top-up.

You may stay logged in throughout the transaction, once the top-up is completed, you will receive the Diamonds in your Garena Free Fire account.

Please enter your Player ID & Nickname correctly to avoid delay on Diamonds top-up.

description.title: Redemption
description.description:
Follow these simple steps to get your diamonds by redeeming the Free Fire code online:

-Go to https://shop.garena.sg/app

-Select Free Fire

-Log into your account either through linked social media or by entering your Player ID.

-Select "Garena Voucher".

-Enter the code you received from us.

-Tap “redeem”.

-The diamonds will then be visible in your Free Fire account.

description.title: Terms and Conditions
description.description:
Select the Diamond denomination.

Enter your Free Fire Player ID and Nickname.

Check out and select your payment method.

Once payment made, the Free Fire Diamond you purchased will be credited to your Free Fire Account shortly.

 

Brand Partner Contact:

 

Visit: https://shop.garena.sg/app

description.title: Product Description
description.description:
Product Description:

Eliza as a visual novel is a collaborative story where player takes a role as a young woman, who has burnt out from the pressures of a high-tech job. She works for a virtual counseling service and guides therapists to provide the best response to patients.

description.description:
Steam Gift Cards work just like gift certificates, which can be redeemed
 on Steam for the purchase of games, software, hardware, and any other 
item you can purchase on Steam.

description.title: Redemption
description.description:
1. LOGIN TO YOUR STEAM ACCOUNT 

2. CLICK ON YOUR ACCOUNT NAME, THEN CLICK ACCOUNT DETAILS

3. CLICK ON “ADD FUNDS TO YOUR STEAM WALLET”. 

4. CLICK “REDEEM A STEAM WALLET CODE”.

5. ENTER YOUR STEAM WALLET GIFT CARD

 

Brand Partner Contact:

Visit: https://www.steam.com

No Value Until Activated at Register
Use of Steam wallet funds requires internet access, a Steam account, and your acceptance of the terms of the Steam Subscriber
The agreement, available at
www.steampowered.com/

subscriber agreement.
Minimum age 13. Please check additional age restrictions before spending Steam Wallet funds.
Data collection and usage is subject to this privacy policy:
http://store.steampowered.com/

privacy agreement.
Wallet funds are not redeemable for cash or credit and are not for resale.
Wallet funds are issued by Valve Corporation.

Retailer acts as agent for Valve Corporation in distributing wallet funds.
These terms do not affect your statutory rights.
For minimum system requirements see
www.steampowered.com.
©Valve Corporation. All rights reserved

description.title: Instructions
description.description:
1. If you already have Steam, go to the Library tab, then click the + icon at the bottom of the page to activate a product on Steam.

2. Otherwise, go to www.steampowered.com/wallet

3. Enter the unique Wallet Code revealed below and follow instructions.

4. The funds will be added to your account and you will land on Steam to complete your purchase.

Have fun!

For assistance, visit
www.steampowered.com/wallet/support

description.title: Product Description
description.description:
Steam Gift Cards work just like gift certificates, which can be redeemed
 on Steam for the purchase of games, software, hardware, and any other 
item you can purchase on Steam.

description.title: Redemption
description.description:
1. LOGIN TO YOUR STEAM ACCOUNT 

2. CLICK ON YOUR ACCOUNT NAME, THEN CLICK ACCOUNT DETAILS

3. CLICK ON “ADD FUNDS TO YOUR STEAM WALLET”. 

4. CLICK “REDEEM A STEAM WALLET CODE”.

5. ENTER YOUR STEAM WALLET GIFT CARD

 

Brand Partner Contact:

Visit: https://www.steam.com

description.title: Product Description
description.description: Topping up your Steam game account wallet with our Steam Gift Card is a great idea  The world-famous PC gaming platform has about 30,000 games for every taste and preference. If you decide to buy a Steam Gift Card in the country Eurozone, then you will have the opportunity to buy a new game on this platform, downloadable content, in-game items for a more comfortable game. Do not forget that such a gift card will be a great gift for a gamer who will decide what to spend it on.

description.title: Redemption Instruction
description.description:
1. Go to store.steampowered.com/account/redeemwalletcode and sign in if you aren't already. You will need to create a Steam account if you do not already have one. Here is the link: store.steampowered.com/join/?snr=
2. Once logged into Steam, please enter your unique Wallet code that you received into the "Steam Wallet Code" field.
3. Click "Continue" to redeem the credit onto your account. Note: If you have never used Steam Wallet credit on your account, you may be prompted to enter your current address to determine the correct currency.
4. The value of the Steam Wallet code will be added to your account's Steam Wallet balance. The current available balance will be listed in the upper right hand corner below your profile name.

description.title: Product Description
description.description:
Razer Gold is the unified virtual credits for gamers worldwide. Use Razer Gold to buy games and in-game content to get more bang for your buck—including getting rewarded with Razer Silver and exclusive game deals.

 

You can make a purchase using Razer Gold in over 2,000 games and entertainment content. Get started by buying Razer Gold today.

 

Each spend in Razer Gold earns you Razer Silver, the only loyalty rewards program for gamers.

description.title: Redemption
description.description:
Reload your Razer Gold account to purchase games, digital content and services.

 

Reload your Razer Gold account at gold.razer.com:

1.       Go to gold.razer.com and login to your Razer Gold account

2.       Click on [Reload Now] and select Razer Gold Gift Card as your payment method

Start spending your Razer Gold to earn Razer Silver
Or Choose [Razer Gold] at supported games, digital content and services

description.description:

Compatible software/hardware/internet access required. Risk of loss and title for this card passes to purchaser upon purchase. Razer is not responsible for any loss or damage resulting from lost or stolen cards, or use without permission, or incorrect use.

 

Not for resale. Not redeemable for cash. No refunds or exchanges, except as required by law. Razer and its licensees, affiliates and licensors make no warranties express or implied with respect to this card and disclaim any warranty to the fullest extent available and as permitted by law. description.title: Product Description
description.description:
This 60 day digital Game Time Code is only valid with North American Square Enix Accounts. Please double check the region of your Square Enix Account before purchasing.

Embark on your epic adventure with the 60 day FINAL FANTASY XIV Online Game Time Code. A great gift for players looking to continue their journey in FINAL FANTASY XIV Online.

You will only be able to use this 60 day code if you have purchased Final Fantasy® XIV and currently have an existing FFXIV account.

description.title: Redemption
description.description:
Have you purchased and receiving a Final Fantasy XIV Time Card from us per email? If so, you can now exchange your code and start exploring the online world of Final Fantasy. Redeeming your FFXIV Time Card can be done like this:

Log in to your FINAL FANTASY XIV: Mog Station account;

Click on “Account Services” in the top left corner of your screen;

After that, click on “Renew Subscription (Game Card)”;

Enter the code you received per email and follow the instructions on your screen to complete the activation.

description.title: Terms and Conditions
description.description:
Please note: You will not receive Reward points for your purchase of GAME Elite Membership.

 

Brand Partner Contact:

Visit: https://www.finalfantacyxiv.com

description.title: Product Description
description.description:
You can choose between various Nintendo Switch Online membership plans:

Individual membership plans provide the service to the Nintendo Account user that purchases the membership.
Family membership plans provide the service to everyone in the purchaser's Nintendo Account family group (up to 8 people).  You can purchase multiple of the same membership plan to extend your overall membership time.  If you already belong to a family membership, you cannot purchase, redeem a download code for, or change to an individual membership.  If you already have an existing membership, you can change from an   individual membership to a family membership, or to a Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack membership, for a discounted price. The discount amount is based on the number of remaining days on your existing membership, up to the full cost of the new membership. For more details, review our Information on Changing a Nintendo Switch Online Membership Plan.

description.title: Redemption
description.description:
1. Select Nintendo eShop on the HOME Menu to launch the Nintendo eShop.
  2. Select the account you want to use.
  3. Select Nintendo Switch Online on the left side of the screen.
  4. Scroll down to Redeem Code and select Enter.
  5. Enter the 16-digit download code for the Nintendo Switch Online membership, then select OK.
  6. Download codes intended for use in the U.S., Canada, and Mexico cannot be used in countries in Latin America (and vice versa).
  7. Make sure to review and accept any required terms that appear on the screen.
Any letters and symbols not used with prepaid codes (i.e. O, I, Z, commas, hyphens, etc.) will be disabled from the on-screen keyboard.
Select Confirm to redeem the code.

description.title: Terms and Conditions
description.description:
To use this card, you must have a wireless internet connection and agree to the network-related terms and conditions and privacy policies. You may also need to create or link a Nintendo Network ID

 

Brand Partner Contact:

https://www.nintendo.com

description.title: Redemption
description.description:
1. Log onto the website of MLBB
https://m.mobilelegends.com/en/

2. Find the ‘Redeem’ button on the right corner and click it.

3. Enter your Game ID and click ‘Send’ button. Then you will receive a verification code in your in-game mailbox. 

4. Enter the code you receive from the in-game mailbox.

5. Finally, enter the 17 digits redemption code and click ‘Redeem’. The item will automatically be sent into your in-game mailbox.

description.title: Marketing Description
description.description:
Endless possibilities are ready in VR. Explore a huge mix of hit games, one-of-a-kind experiences, new ways to create and connect, and live events.

• Cards can be redeemed on over 350 apps, games and experiences in the Meta Quest store.
• Explore fantasy realms, get in shape, or travel deep into space: there are VR experiences to suit everyone.
• It’s easy to give a digital Gift Card, all you need is the recipient’s email address.
• Valid only for U.S. transactions from the Meta Quest Store. Cards do not expire and carry no service or dormancy fees. Not redeemable for cash, and cannot be transferred, resold, returned, refunded, or exchanged, except as required by law. Terms and Conditions apply. Void where prohibited.

description.title: Redemption Instructions
description.description:
Meta Quest Mobile App:
1. Install the Meta Quest app on your iPhone or Android phone 
2. Sign in with (or create) your Meta account 
3. Go to ‘Wallet’ in the Menu of the Meta Quest app 
4. Click on ‘+’ button to open ‘Add to Wallet’ 
5. In the “Add to Wallet” select and click on ‘Gift Card’ option 
6. Enter your Gift Card Code 
7. Click ‘Redeem’ button 
8. Meta Quest Gift Card will be added to your Meta Quest wallet. 
9. You can now use your Gift Card to purchase apps & experiences at the Meta Quest Store 

Web Browser:
1. Go to https://store.meta.com/redeem-code 
2. Sign in with (or create) your Meta account 
3. Enter your Gift Code 
4. Click on ‘ ->’ button 
5. Meta Quest Gift Card will be added to your Meta Quest wallet. 
6. You can now use your Gift Card to purchase apps & experiences at the Meta Quest Store

description.title: Terms and Conditions
description.description:
Meta Quest Gift Cards are solely for the purchase in the US of content, apps, and services from the Meta Quest Store. Cards do not expire and carry no service or dormancy fees. Cards are not redeemable for cash and cannot be transferred, resold, returned, refunded, or exchanged, except as required by law. Recipients must be age 13 or older. 

Issued by Meta Platforms Inc. (“Meta”). Meta is not responsible for lost or stolen gift cards or unauthorized use. Terms and Conditions apply; see store.meta.com/qgc. For assistance, visit store.facebook.com/help/support/quest/. 

Do not share your code. Beware of common scams that include payment demanded in the form of gift cards.

Sie dürfen nicht weiterveräuẞert oder gegen Entgelt an Dritte übertragen werden, sofern nicht gesetzlich vorgeschrieben. Gutscheine können auf amazon.de/einloesen eingelöst werden. description.title: Redemption
description.description:
SO LÖSEN SIE IHREN CODE EIN

Einlösung
Amazon.de Geschenkgutscheine und Geschenkkarten sind bis zum Ende des zehnten Jahres nach Kauf des Gutscheins einlösbar ("Ablaufdatum").
Restguthaben werden bis zum Ablaufdatum Ihrem Geschenkgutscheinkonto gutgeschrieben, danach können sie nicht mehr verwendet werden.
Geschenkgutscheine können nur auf www.amazon.de oder www.amazon.at ("Zugelassene Websites") für Produkte eingelöst werden, welche für den Erwerb durch Gutschein zugelassen sind. Sie sind nicht auf anderen Amazon Websites z.B. bei Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.fr, Amazon.it, Amazon.co.jp, Amazon.com, Amazon.ca oder Amazon.cn einlösbar.
Geschenkgutscheine können über das reguläre Bestellformular (Einkaufswagen) oder vor einer Bestellung über "Mein Konto" als Guthaben eingelöst werden. Um einen Geschenkgutschein im Rahmen des Amazon.de 1-Click®-Service nutzen zu können, lösen Sie den Gutschein-Code zunächst über "Mein Konto" unter "Geschenkgutschein-Guthaben prüfen und Geschenkgutscheine einlösen" ein.
Bei Musik-Download-Einkäufen lösen Sie Geschenkgutscheine folgendermaßen ein:


Gehen Sie auf die Detailseite des gewünschten Titels.
Klicken Sie rechts oben unterhalb der Schaltfläche "Jetzt mit 1-Click® kaufen" auf den Link "Gutscheincode eingeben".
Fügen Sie unter "Neuen Gutscheincode eingeben" den Code ein und klicken Sie auf "Einlösen".
Sollte der Wert des Gutscheins für Ihre Bestellung nicht ausreichen, können Sie die Differenz mit einer anderen, von Amazon zugelassenen Zahlungsweise oder durch die Eingabe weiterer Geschenkgutscheine auf derselben Seite begleichen.
Bei einer Bestellung kann mehr als ein Geschenkgutschein verwendet werden. Geschenkgutscheine sind mit 1 Aktionsgutschein pro Bestellung kombinierbar.
Um Geschenkgutscheine auf Ihrem Kundenkonto einzulösen oder ein bestehendes Guthaben einzusehen, besuchen Sie bitte "Mein Konto" auf .

To redeem your gift card, follow these steps:


1.       Visit www.amazon.com/redeem

2.       Enter the Claim Code when prompted.

If you have questions about redeeming your gift card, please visit www.amazon.com/gc-redeem.

description.title: Terms and Conditions
description.description:
HOE INWISSELEN

Voor het inwisselen van de tegoedbon gaat u als volgt te werk:
1. Ga naar www.amazon.nl/gp/gc. Klik op "Amazon Cadeaubon Inwisselen" en voer de tegoedboncode in als u hierom gevraagd wordt.

2. De tegoedbonbedragen worden tijdens het afmelden automatisch toegepast op de
bestellingen die in aanmerking komen voor het gebruik van de tegoedbon.

3. Het resterende saldo van uw bestelling dient u met een andere betalingsmethode te
voldoen.

U kunt de tegoedboncode ook invoeren als u hier tijdens het afmelden om gevraagd wordt. Het inwisselen van uw tegoedbon is echter niet mogelijk bij gebruik van Amazon.nl 1-Click®-Services, tenzij u de tegoedbon eerst via uw account inwisselt.

ALGEMENE VOORWAARDEN

Cadeaubonnen van Amazon.nl kunnen alleen worden gebruikt voor de aankoop van
in aanmerking komende producten op Amazon.nl en op bepaalde gelieerde
websites. Het saldo van de cadeaubon moet binnen 10 jaar na aankoop worden
gebruikt. Cadeaubonnen kunnen niet worden doorverkocht of ingewisseld voor
contant geld. Cadeaubonnen worden uitgegeven door Amazon EU S.à r.l., een
onderneming in Luxemburg. Amazon EU S.à r.l. en haar dochterondernemingen
zijn niet aansprakelijk bij verlies, diefstal, beschadiging of misbruik van een
cadeaubon. Ga naar amazon.nl/inwisselen om je cadeaubon in te wisselen. Ga naar
amazon.nl/cb-juridisch voor de volledige algemene voorwaarden. Er worden geen
servicekosten in rekening gebracht.

VERVALDATUM

Vervalt 10 jaar na datum van uitgifte.

description.title: Product Description
description.description:
Since 1825 we’ve always thought differently about creating the perfect shoe. Starting with examining the biomechanics of the foot, and the way it moves at work, rest and play. That’s why every pair of Clarks begins with advanced technologies and contemporary materials that help us deliver comfort and style tailor-made for the modern world. From responsive underfoot cushioning to rapid prototyping and 3D printing, brilliant ideas are what set us apart. With a heritage of more than 190 years of shoemaking and expertise, we continue to craft the finest shoes for all walks of life. Clarks styles have sparked a revolution, defined a generation and captured the imagination, like the iconic Clarks Desert Boot. Designed by Nathan Clark, launched in 1950, its appeal endures to this day.

Premium. Refined. Modern classics crafted in comfort. This is Clarks.

View all our latest collections at clarksusa.com

description.description:

To redeem in stores, present gift card to cashier in any Clarks, Clarks Outlet or Bostonian store at the time of purchase.

In-Store Mobile Redemption Instructions
Recipient:
To redeem your gift card from a mobile device display the gift card number and associated PIN to the cashier at the time of purchase. 

Cashier:
Hand key the gift card number and associated PIN into the POS.

Online Redemption Instructions
To redeem online at www.clarksusa.com, enter the gift card number and PIN number at the checkout payment step.

description.description: This gift card is redeemable for goods or services at any Clarks or Clarks Outlet store location in the United States and Puerto Rico and online at www.clarksusa.com. This card is redeemable for merchandise only and may not be redeemed for cash except to the extent that applicable law otherwise requires. No fees will be charged for non-use. There are no service fees. There is no expiration date. This card is not returnable and non-refundable. Protect this card: lost, stolen, destroyed cards or cards used without your permission will not be replaced. Please visit www.clarksusa.com for balance information. We look forward to serving you.

description.description:

1.Select 'Add gift card' under payment in checkout.

code in the pop-up screen.

With price, quality and sustainability deeply rooted in its DNA, H&M is not only a possibility for everyone to explore their personal style, but it also offers a chance to create a more sustainable fashion future.

description.description: A NIKE, Inc. nomeada em homenagem à deusa grega da vitória, é a principal designer, comerciante e distribuidora mundial de calçados esportivos autênticos, roupas, equipamentos e acessórios para uma ampla variedade de atividades esportivas e de condicionamento físico. A Nike cria serviços e experiências para os atletas de hoje. Como dizem na Nike, se você tem um corpo, você é um atleta. Dê um presente que inspire e motive o atleta de hoje com um cartão-presente ou E-presente da Nike

description.title: Product description
description.description: With a Walmart e-Gift Card, you get low prices every day on thousands of popular products in stores or online at Walmart.com. You’ll find a wide assortment of top electronics, toys, home essentials and more. Plus, cards don’t expire and you never pay any fees.

description.title: Redemption

description.title: Terms and Conditions
description.description:

See full terms, which may change without notice, athttp://Walmart.com/giftcardterms. No cash redemption unless required by law. No replacement for lost/stolen cards. Brand Partner Contact:

Visit: www.walmart.com

description.title: product Description
description.description:
Walmart Canada operates hundreds of stores nationwide, serving more than a million customers every, while walmart.ca is visited by thousands of customers daily. Walmart is committed to saving Canadians money so they can live better, and their stores carry thousands of products, ranging from groceries, clothing and beauty products, to home decor and electronics, all offered at low prices every day.

This card can only be used in Canada. It can take up to 48 hours from the time of purchase to review and process your order. Please visit our eGift FAQs for further info.

description.title: Redemption
description.description:
Redeem a Walmart eGift Card

This Walmart eGift Card can only be used in Canada. It can be redeemed in-store at participating Canadian locations of Walmart, or it can be redeemed online at Walmart.ca. When redeemed, the amount of your purchase will be deducted from the value on the card until the balance reaches zero.

In-Store Redemption

Print out the eGift Card at home first, or display it on your smartphone, then show it to the cashier or sales associate when you go to pay for your purchases, making sure that the card number and PIN code (if required) are clearly visible. If you are using the self-checkout when in-store, select Gift Card as a payment method and then use the hand scanner to scan the card's barcode.

Online Redemption

To redeem this eGift online, visit Walmart.ca, then enter the card number and PIN code (if required) to apply it during online check-out.

description.title: Gift Thoughts
description.description:
Give the gift that never goes out of style!
No matter who you’re celebrating, SHEIN E-Gift Cards are a super quick and easy way for you and your friends and family to shop. 
No shipping, no card to lose, and no hassles!

description.title: Terms and Conditions
description.description:
ar.shein.com

*Note:  
  
''Only valid in Shein Saudi Arabia, United Arab Emirates, Oman, Kuwait, Qatar, Bahrain'

1. Redemption and Limitations Gift cards may be redeemed on SHEIN to purchase products and services. 

2. Gift Card Redemption 
You may enter the gift card number and PIN number when you are checking out. The amount will be deducted from the gift card. If the payable balance is more than the balance on the gift card, you may select other payment methods to pay for the remaining amount.

3. View Balance
You may check your gift card balance in your SHEIN account.
The balance in your gift card may be used on SHEIN to purchase products and services. 
The gift card balance cannot be withdrawn for cash.

4. Validity Period and Refund
The validity period for gift cards is one year after purchase. Once a gift card has been redeemed, it cannot be returned.
If an order is paid by a gift card and a refund was requested, the portion paid by the gift card will be returned to the gift card.

5. Gift Card Lost or Stolen
SHEIN is not responsible for lost, stolen, or unauthorized gift cards.

description.title: Using a Tinder promo code
description.description:
Sometimes we offer special promotions and discount pricing on Tinder's premium features. Follow the steps below to redeem your code! 

Already a Tinder user? 
  1. Visit Tinder.com and sign into your account 
  2. Tap the profile icon
  3. Scroll down and tap Promo Code
  4. Enter your promo code and hit Submit 
  5. If asked, enter your credit card information, and continue

New to Tinder? 
  1. Visit Tinder.com and scroll down to the footer
  2. Under the Community heading, tap Promo Code
  3. Enter your promo code and hit Submit
  4. Tap Log In With Phone Number or Login With Facebook to sign up for Tinder and create an account 
  5. If asked, enter your credit card information, and continue

description.title: Tinder Voucher Terms and Conditions
description.description:
Tinder vouchers (“Vouchers”) are valid for one-time use only and cannot be redeemed by multiple users.
Promotion is subject to availability and applicable only for redemption in Bangladesh Albania Taiwan, Brazil, Algeria, Cambodia, American Samoa, Chile, Andorra, Colombia, Angola, Egypt, Anguilla, Ghana, Armenia, India, Argentina, Indonesia, Aruba, Laos, Austria, Malaysia, Azerbaijan, Mexico, Bahamas, The Mongolia, Bahrain, Morocco, Belarus, Myanmar Belgium, Nigeria Bermuda, Philippines, Bolivia, Thailand, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Vietnam, Botswana, Bulgaria, Brunei, Canada, Costa Rica, Cote D'Ivoire (Ivory Coast), Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Czechia, Denmark, Dominican Republic, East Timor, Ecuador, Guatemala, El Salvador, Estonia, Fiji Islands, Finland, France, Gabon, Georgia, Germany, Greece, Honduras, Hong Kong, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Jamaica, Jordan, Kazakhstan, Kenya, Korea (Republic of), Kuwait, Kyrgyzstan, Latvia, Lebanon, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Maldives, Malta, Mauritius, Nepal, Netherlands, Netherlands Antilles, New Zealand, Norway, Oman, Panama, Paraguay, Palestine, Peru, Poland, Portugal, Puerto Rico, Qatar, Reunion, Romania, Saudi Arabia, Senegal, Seychelles, Singapore, Sint Maarten, Slovakia, South Africa, Spain, Suriname, Sweden, Switzerland, Tanzania, Trinidad And Tobago, Tunisia, UAE, Uruguay, Uzbekistan, Vanuatu, Venezuela, Virgin Islands (US), Zimbabwe
Strictly no resale, for personal use only.       
Tinder account required. 

Users must be 18 years or older to use Tinder.

Vouchers are subject to expiry and are valid for a period of sixty (60) days from the date of purchase.
Only users not currently subscribed to an active Tinder subscription are eligible to redeem Vouchers. 
Redeem via the link provided.
The offer is not valid in combination with any other offer and cannot be exchanged for cash.
Offer eligibility subject to Tinder’s terms of use (https://gotinder.com/terms). Tinder is a registered trademark of Match Group, LLC.

description.title: Product Description
description.description:
•        Use the EZ PIN gift cards to purchase over 500 gift cards at EZPIN.com

•        Can be redeemed on payment checkout at EZPIN.com

•        It is available only to EZ PIN customers

•        No returns or refunds on EZ PIN gift cards

description.title: Redemption
description.description:
To redeem your gift card, follow these steps:

1.      Login into https://panel.ezpaypin.com/

2.      Click on the +Payment tab on top of the page

3.      Click on “Redeem gift card” tab

4.      Enter your EZPIN gift car code to redeem your card

description.title: Terms and Conditions
description.description:
•        EZ PIN is not responsible for unauthorized use

•        EZ PIN gift cards are non-refundable/non-exchangeable and cannot be exchanged for cash in part or full, and it is valid for a single transaction only.

•        EZ PIN gift cards cannot be replaced if lost, stolen, or damaged.

•        EZ PIN gift cards are valid till the claim-by-date.

•        EZ PIN gift cards only can be used in their specific region.

•        EZ PIN gift cards will be under terms and conditions of their brands.

 

For any discrepancy or complains, send your request to:  egift@ezpin.com
